fields.environment:
- testing on galaxy s4
- Ti SDK 3.2.1

comments.body: Moving this ticket to engineering as I can reproduce this issue on Android device easily. Same code works fine on iOS platform.
Hoping for a fix on this issue soon.

I am able to reproduce this issue with the following environment;
Pixel (7.1)
Studio 4.9.0.201705302345
Ti SDK 6.1.1 GA
Appc NPM 4.2.9
Appc CLI 6.2.2
Ti CLI 5.0.14
Alloy 1.9.11
Xcode 8.2 (8C38)
Node v4.8.2
Java 1.8.0_131

FR Passed.
Waiting for merge to be enabled.

Closing ticket. Fix can be seen in SDK Version: 7.3.0.v20180613110103

Test and other information can be found at: 
https://github.com/appcelerator/titanium_mobile/pull/10007
